update-checker.running-latest: <white>You are running the latest version of <plugin_name>!
update-checker.update-found-console:
<white>An update was found for <plugin_name>!
    <white>Current version: <red>v<version_current>
    <white>Latest version: <green><click:open_url:'<download_link>'><hover:show_text:'<green>Open Download Page'>v<version_latest></hover></click>
update-checker.update-found-player:
<white>An update was found for <plugin_name>!
  <dark_gray>• <white>Current version: <red>v<version_current>
  <dark_gray>• <white>Latest version: <green><click:open_url:'<download_link>'><hover:show_text:'<green>Open Download Page'>v<version_latest></hover></click>

translation.help:
<white>Translations subcommands:
  <dark_gray>• <white>reload: <gray><i>Reloads the translation files.
  <dark_gray>• <white>test <node>: <gray><i>Test a translation.

spawner.has-architect: Looks like you already have company. I can't spare another architect to go with you.
spawner.has-town: Looks like you're already in a town. If you want to create your own town, you have to leave your current one first.
spawner.cannot-afford: You don't have enough money to create a new town right now. Come back when you have %s⊚.
spawner.spawn: So you want to create a town? [Yes/No]
spawner.spawned: This architect will go with you. Lead them to where you want your new town, and let them work their magic.
spawner.come-back: Come back to me when you're ready to start your very own town.

upgrade.lore-2: <grey>You've reached the maximum level for this steward.
upgrade.unclickable-message: <green>You've reached the maximum level for this steward.

hire.name: <green>Hire the Treasurer
hire.lore-2: <grey>The Treasurer will allow you to increase your town bank limit.

striking.name: <green>Your Treasurer is striking
striking.lore-1: <grey>You weren't able to pay your Treasurer's wage, so they are now striking.

hired.name: <green>Treasurer
hired.lore-2: <grey>Talk to the Treasurer to upgrade them and increase your bank limit.

hire.name: <green>Hire the Bailiff
hire.lore-2: <grey>The Bailiff will grant you extra claims.

hired.name: <green>Bailiff
hired.lore-2: <grey>Talk to the Bailiff to upgrade them and increase your bonus claims.

hire.name: <green>Hire the Port Master
hire.lore-2: <grey>The Port Master will allow you to create a port.

striking.name: <green>Your Port Master is striking
striking.lore-1: <grey>You weren't able to pay your Port Master's wage, so they are now striking.

hired.name: <green>Port Master
hired.lore-2: <grey>Talk to the Port Master to upgrade your port.

hire.name: <green>Hire the Stable Master
hire.lore-2: <grey>The Stable Master will allow you to create a port.

striking.name: <green>Your Stable Master is striking
striking.lore-1: <grey>You weren't able to pay your Stable Master's wage, so they are now striking.

hired.name: <green>Stable Master
hired.lore-2: <grey>Talk to the Stable Master to upgrade your port.

hire.name: <green>Hire the Guard Captain
hire.lore-2: <grey>The Guard Captain will allow you to create a port.

striking.name: <green>Your Guard Captain is striking
striking.lore-1: <grey>You weren't able to pay your Guard Captain's wage, so they are now striking.

hired.name: <green>Guard Captain
hired.lore-2: <grey>Talk to the Guard Captain to get more guards.

message.limit-reached: <red>You have reached the maximum number of Guards for this level.

spawn.name: <green>Spawn another guard.
spawn.name-limit-reached: <red>You have reached the maximum number of Guards for this level.

chase-range.name: <green>Chase range
chase-range.lore-1: <grey>How far a guard will chase an enemy.

melee-range.name: <green>Melee range
melee-range.lore-1: <grey>The range at which a guard will start chasing a target.

ranged-range.name: <green>Ranged range
ranged-range.lore-1: <grey>The range at which a guard will start shooting a target.

wander-range.name: <green>Wander range
wander-range.lore-1: <grey>How far the guard will wander from their anchor point. Set to 0 to disable.

dismiss.title: Dismiss steward
dismiss.dismiss-steward-lore: <red>This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

fire.title: Fire <type>
fire.fire-lore: <red>This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

hire.title: Hire <type>
hire.portmaster-closer: <red>The Port Master needs to be closer to water.
hire.not-enough-funds: <red>There's not enough money in your town bank to hire this steward.
hire.too-close: <red>This steward is too close to another steward.

stipend.title: Pay <type>
stipend.not-enough-funds: <red>There's not enough money in your town bank to pay this steward.

upgrade.title: Upgrade <type>
upgrade.upgrade-success: <green>You have upgraded yor steward to level <level>!
upgrade.not-enough-funds: <red>There's not enough money in your town bank to hire this steward.

towny.new-town-name: What do you want your town to be called?
towny.new-town-confirmation: Do you want to create the town %s? [Yes/No]

error.resident-null: <red>Something went wrong. Please contact staff if this issue persists.
error.towny-exception: <red>Something went wrong. Please contact staff if this issue persists.
error.improper-trait: <red>Something went wrong. Please report this issue.
error.no-upgrade: <red>Something went wrong. Please report this issue.
error.dismiss: <red>You need to hire or dismiss the spawned steward before you can spawn another one.
error.spawn-failed: <red>Couldn't spawn another Guard. Please contact staff if this issue persists.
